en.AidFast рж╣рж▓рзЛ ржПржХржЯрж┐ ржорзЛржм: AidFast is a mobile app and website where you can easily find information and contact doctors, hospitals, diagnostic centers, ambulances, dental clinics, blood donors, and all health services in one place. You can directly take doctor serials and advance appointments over the phone.
en.AidFast ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржк ржжрж┐рзЯрзЗ ржЖ: What can I do with the AidFast app?
en.ржЖржкржирж┐ ржкрж╛рж░ржмрзЗржи тАУ ржкр: You can find doctors in your area when needed, search hospitals, clinics, diagnostic centers, call directly to take serials, find nearby blood banks and donors, get emergency ambulances, and access all necessary health service information for your preferred location with just one click.
en.AidFast ржХрж┐ ржкрзБрж░рзЛ ржмрж╛ржВрж▓: Does AidFast work all over Bangladesh?
en.рж╣рзБржоред ржПржЦржи рж╕ржорзНржкрзБрж: Yes, currently AidFast services cover the entire Sylhet division, Brahmanbaria, Faridpur, some districts of Mymensingh, and over 10 other districts. By 2025, all doctors and health service institutions across Bangladesh will be included in the AidFast app.
en.рж╣рзНржпрж╛ржБ! ржЗржЙржЬрж╛рж░ржжрзЗрж: Yes! The AidFast app is completely free for users. You can easily download it from the Google Play Store. AidFast mobile app is easy and smart to use. Click to download the app. Download link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.aidfastbd.app
en.рж╣рзНржпрж╛ржБред ржЖржкржирж╛рж░ ржХрз: Yes. This app works without any personal information. It only helps to find information. You can use it safely.
en.AidFast-ржП ржХрзАржнрж╛ржмрзЗ рж░рзЗржЬ: How can I register on AidFast? (For doctors, hospitals, diagnostic centers, and other health service providers)
en.(ржбрж╛ржХрзНрждрж╛рж░/рж╣рж╛рж╕ржкрж╛рж: Very easy! You can register yourself, or our team will guide you over phone or in-person. You can contact us via the Contact Us page or fill out the form at the bottom of the website. Contact: 01338988734. Our representatives will contact you shortly.
en.ржЖржорж┐ рж░ржХрзНрждржжрж╛рждрж╛ рж╣рж: I want to be a blood donor. How can I join AidFast?
en.рж░ржХрзНрждржжрж╛рждрж╛ рж╣рж┐рж╕рзЗржм: To join as a blood donor, open the app, select the 'Add Blood Donor' option from your nearest blood donor organization, then provide your name, blood group, and contact number to become a registered donor.
en.ржХрзЛржирзЛ рж╕ржорж╕рзНржпрж╛рзЯ ржкрз: Who do I contact if I face any issues?
en.ржЖржкржирж┐ ржЖржорж╛ржжрзЗрж░ ржлрзЗрж: You can inbox us on our Facebook page, call directly via Contact Number / WhatsApp on the website, or send an email. You can also fill out the form at the bottom of the website. For urgent health services, you can call the emergency helpline number directly via our app or website. Helpline number: 01338988734.
en.AidFast ржорзВрж▓ржд рж╕рж╛ржзрж╛рж░ржг: AidFast is mainly for the general public, patients, doctors, hospitals, clinics, diagnostic centers, blood donors, and health service providers. Both seekers and providers will benefit from this platform. Communication will be easy and hassle-free.
en.AidFast ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржк ржХрзАржнрж╛ржмр: How do I download the AidFast app?
en.ржЖржкржирж┐ Play Store-ржП ржЧрж┐рзЯрзЗ: Go to the Play Store, type 'AidFast', and install it. Or click directly here ЁЯСЙ https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.aidfastbd.app
en.AidFast ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржкрзЗ рж░рзЗржЬрж┐р: Can I use AidFast app without registration?
en.рж╣рзНржпрж╛ржБред ржЖржкржирж┐ рж░рзЗрж: Yes. You can view doctor names, hospital addresses, phone numbers, serial times, blood donor information and much more without registering.
en.AidFast ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржкрзЗ ржХрзАржнрж╛р: How do I take a serial in the AidFast app?
en.ржкрзНрж░рждрж┐ржЯрж┐ ржбрж╛ржХрзНрждрж╛: Each doctor's profile includes a phone number to call directly for a serial. You can also take advance appointments through the appointment section. The institution will call you to confirm the appointment.
en.AidFast-ржП ржжрзЗржУрзЯрж╛ рждржерзНржп: How accurate is the information on AidFast?
en.ржЖржорж╛ржжрзЗрж░ Aidfast рж░рзЗржЬрж┐р: Our AidFast registration team directly verifies and approves the information. Institutions can update their profiles themselves. Therefore, the data is reliable and up-to-date.
en.AidFast ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржкрзЗ рж░ржХрзНржд: How does the blood search system in AidFast work?
en.ржЖржкржирж┐ рж╢рзБржзрзБ рж░ржХрзНрждрз: You just select the blood group and your location to get names and mobile numbers of nearby blood banks and donors. This makes searching for blood easier and faster.
en.AidFast ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржкрзЗ ржХрж┐ ржирж╛: Does AidFast include nursing homes, dental clinics, or eye clinics?
en.рж╣рзНржпрж╛ржБ! ржЖржкржирж┐ AidFast рж: Yes! You can find information about various clinics, nursing homes, dental care, and eye centers in the AidFast app.
en.AidFast ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржк ржмрзНржпржмрж╣р: Do I need internet to use the AidFast app?
en.рж╣рзНржпрж╛ржБред рж╕рж╛ржзрж╛рж░ржгржн: Yes. Generally, you can use the app as long as your mobile device has internet connectivity. The internet cost is very low.
en.ржЖржорж┐ ржХрзАржнрж╛ржмрзЗ ржПржорзНрж: How do I find an ambulance?
en.\"ржПржорзНржмрзБрж▓рзЗржирзНрж╕\" рж╕рз: Go to the 'Ambulance' section to see all ambulance service information and numbers in your area.
en.Aidfast ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржк ржХрзЗржи ржкрзН: Why is the AidFast app needed?
en.ржЬрж░рзБрж░рж┐ рж╕ржорзЯрзЗ ржЕржирзЗрж: Many people don't know where to find doctors, hospitals, or ambulances nearby during emergencies. AidFast solves this problem тАФ with just a few clicks, it brings the health services you need to your fingertips.
en.AidFast ржЕрзНржпрж╛ржк ржХрж┐ржнрж╛ржмр: How can the AidFast app save lives?
en.ржЬрж░рзБрж░рж┐ рж░ржХрзНрждрзЗрж░ ржкрз: During emergencies like urgent blood needs, heart attacks, accidents, or childbirth, lack of timely information and services endangers many lives. AidFast promptly provides nearby blood donors, ambulances, or hospital information to ensure timely help.
en.FAQ Description: Please review the information below to find clear and concise answers to your frequently asked questions about our services. We have made every effort to explain the most common and important topics in a straightforward way for your convenience
